name: ENTER
description:
A dark, cartoon style action game for 1, 2 or 4 players. Local couch multiplay (PVP and PVE) on same screen.

"Agent, find your way into that mansion. Doctor Zoltowski has discovered a vaccine that could fix the recent... events. Our informant has indicated that the doctor has separated the formula into 4 pieces and hidden it somewhere inside to safeguard his experiments. You must retrieve that vaccine for our agency at all costs. Our rivals are sure to send in their dogs. Intel suggests security staff have trapped the premises in anticipation of your arrival. All contact has been lost with our inside man. Good luck..."

Gameplay:

Mansion has 4 wings. Each player starts in different wing.

Players must search mansion for 4 pieces of the vaccine formula.

Active traps are in place, but player can find traps and place them.

Traps have counters (Gas mask counters gas etc)

Current traps: Blackout, Power surge,  Turret, Gas, Acid etc

Opposing forces: Zombies, Mansion security, other player(s).

This is still work in progress (WIP).
